text:
On every SSL Connection established to the tomcat server a
javax.net.ssl.SSLPeerUnverifiedException is thrown. This is not true if I use
the old http connector.
creator: s.lechner@igel.de

text:
This is a warning which can be ignored (and has been removed). 4.1.13 will have
the fix.
creator: remm@apache.org

text: *** Bug 15268 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
